name: TOP SECRET (itch) (Brownie Studios)
description:
Shhh, this information is classified.

Julius needs your help to obtain the information in a mysterious database, you got to find the encryption keys, easy task right? Just watch out, there's a time limit, if you lose your time, you will get trapped.

Maybe you can learn new things in your missions, or find out something interesting.

All assets in the game are handmade by us, 100% organic and locally sourced.

We will be working on more features, stay tuned.
